                    ax=ax, 
                    orientation='horizontal',
                   aspect = 30   #control the width of color bar. higher value= lower width.
                   )

# Set a label for the colorbar

plt.title("Continents of the world based on number of countries")

            bbox_inches = "tight",
           dpi = 300)

# Show the plot
